Reviews.Content: Amazing hotel with very friendly staff We stay in Bali Paradise Hotel from 08-04 till 22-04 2008The hotel was incredible and it`s be situated in the centre of ricefields. De beth - and bathrooms are very big, clean and so nice decorated. The staff is friendly and very helpfull. The food is delicious. For us was this the first time we were in this hotel but difinitely not the last time.We thank the staff and management for the beautifull vacation.written by Annie Jansen, The Netherlands
Reviews.Author: Kuypers

Reviews.Content: Very new,nice and clean Hotel The hotel is new and well disigned and i have been their in march! The rooms and bathrooms are big and nice decorated.Their is internet, bars and a nice pool area!The view from the balconey is breathtaken to see sunrise, ocean and ricefields.The staff is very friendly and the food is exellent.Everythng is clean and i felt realy happy their.I will come back to the hotel for sure.
Reviews.Author: sunitran

Reviews.Author: zippeguenter
